Others: England won the Euro 2024 quarter-final against Switzerland in a penalty shootout.
Jordan Pickford saved a penalty in the shootout, adding to his record of three major tournament shootout saves.
Bukayo Saka scored a penalty in the shootout, overcoming his miss in the 2021 Euro final.
The article discusses England's penalty routine, which includes a 'buddy system' and detailed notes for the goalkeeper.
